definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Check ring joint (CRJ) structure was utilized in USPG.
sentences.chinese: 卡環式連接結構被應用於水下夾樁器。

sentences.english: The paper briefly describes present state of airborne laser reconnaissance subaquatic targets technology at abroad.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了國外機載激光偵察水下目標技術的發展現狀。

sentences.english: With underwater kick, your movement should be similar to a wave.
sentences.chinese: 在水下踢腿時，你的身體動態應該如波浪一樣。

sentences.english: There, robotic arms transfer the fuel into storage cassettes underwater.
sentences.chinese: 在那裏，機器手臂將燃料轉移到水下的儲藏容器裏。

sentences.english: Objective To study the dose-effects relationship of underwater blast injury.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討水下衝擊傷的量效關係。

sentences.english: A Hawaiian green sea turtle swims in just a few feet of water.
sentences.chinese: 一隻夏威夷綠海龜在幾英尺水下游泳。

sentences.english: Extraoral vast shoals of the Pearl River waterfront, the underwater beach off the coast to slow gradient.
sentences.chinese: 珠江口外海濱灘塗遼闊，水下灘地向岸外緩慢坡降。

sentences.english: Celestite holds the vibration of underwater worlds in the language of light.
sentences.chinese: 天青石持有光之語中水下世界的振動。

sentences.english: We can still hear sounds while our heads aare under water.
sentences.chinese: 當我們的頭埋入水下時，我們仍能聽到聲音。

sentences.english: The submarine underwater motion is the multi-stance 3D movement.
sentences.chinese: 潛艇水下運動是多姿態的三維空間運動。

sentences.english: It's the first submerged circumnavigation of the Earth.
sentences.chinese: 這是第一次核潛艇環球水下航行。

sentences.english: While treading water, one does not push down on the water.
sentences.chinese: 當你做踩水動作時，你不會從水面之上向水下壓水。

sentences.english: Five divers descended daily to look for teh remains of the ship.
sentences.chinese: 每天五名潛水員下潛到水下尋找船隻的殘骸。

sentences.english: The under water pelletizing system is relatively complicated and highly costive to maintain.
sentences.chinese: 水下切粒整個系統比較複雜，操作維護成本較高。

sentences.english: They did a drill this week where they hid a bomb underwater.
sentences.chinese: 本週他們做了一次演練，他們把一枚炸彈藏在水下。

sentences.english: Loggerhead turtles can stay underwater for up to an hour.
sentences.chinese: 蠵龜在水下停留的時間長達1小時。

definition: Shuishang township in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan
to dive/to go under water/(in an online forum) to lurk
